name: Buffalo Chicken Fingers from Pretzel Crisps®
author: Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
summary: Fried chicken tenders with a crisp buffalo wing pretzel coating are served with a creamy blue cheese sauce and buffalo wing sauce.
ingredients: 2 cups Buffalo Wing Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
1 ½ cups buffalo wing sauce, divided
¼ cup blue cheese crumbles, or to taste
directions: Using a rolling pin, crush Pretzel Crisps® until fine, but with some texture
In a bowl, beat together the egg and one cup of the buffalo wing sauce, and set aside
Dip each chicken tender first in the egg mixture and roll to coat in the crushed pretzels
In a large skillet, heat oil over medium high heat until shimmering
Add chicken tenders and cook, turning often, until golden brown on all sides (about six minutes total)
Transfer to paper towels to drain
In a small bowl, combine mayonnaise, sour cream, blue cheese, and Worcestershire sauce
Serve blue cheese sauce with chicken and remaining 1/2 cup or reserved wing sauce
